title: The $90 Billion Squeeze: What the Triad's Budget Really Means for Your Capture Strategy
description: Two massive funding streams converge as the Pentagon tears up its acquisition rulebook. Understanding the DHP budget, Rural Health Transformation Program, and what Hegseth's 8(a) crackdown means for defense health contractors.

title: The MHS Triad, Part 2: The Capability Stack
description: H2F, telehealth platforms, Oracle's Clinical AI Agent, and what the Oura disaster teaches us about audit-ready data architecture. Plus predictions for 2026-2028.

title: The MHS Triad, Part 1: Meet the Three Leaders Who Will Reshape Military Medicine
description: Keith Bass, Emil Michael, and Admiral Darin Via form an interlocking system that's about to transform the Military Health System. Here's what you need to know.

title: Department of War: The Doctrine Shift That Changes Everything
description: Executive Order 14347 isn't just optics. The shift from patient satisfaction to return-to-duty rates signals a fundamental reorientation of military medicine.

title: The Audit Mandate: Why Everything Has to Work Now
description: DoD must achieve a clean audit opinion by December 31, 2028. Section 1002 of the FY2026 NDAA gives this mandate real teeth. Here's what it means for health IT.

title: The Oura Disaster: Lessons from a $96M Wearables Failure
description: The sole-source contract didn't die because WHOOP filed a protest. It died because DHA couldn't audit the data. What this means for the future of wearables in defense health.

title: Human Performance Optimization: The Human Weapon System Doctrine
description: Admiral Via's vision for military medicine isn't healthcare. It's treating warfighters as the most important weapon system in our arsenal.

title: GenAI.mil: AI is America's Next Manifest Destiny
description: Emil Michael just put Google's Gemini on every DoD desktop. 3 million users, every classification level. This isn't a pilot program.
